ForwardReachabilitySearch(N, \phi):
    P = Ø
    W = {s_0}
    pick s \in W:
        if s \satisfies \phi
            return true
        for all s' \in s\cdot
            W = W \union {s'}
            W = W \union tock_changes(s') // TODO: what to do to avoid tock-tock-tock's
        W = W \setdifference {s}
        P = P \union {s} // <-- here is where you put back-traceability
        if W = Ø
            return false
